# PageRelations Application relations.description=The [[Relations extension>>https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Page%20Relations%20Application/]] allows to relate pages to one another either within the same wiki or across distinct wikis.
# Class fields XWiki.Relations.IsRelatedToClass_page=Page
